name: Little Star !!! ⭐
wishText: So happy for your growing family 💙
textInChatBox: Double the giggles, double the love!🎉
text2: Cherish every tiny finger 🤌🏻, every sleepy yawn 🥱
text5Content: We are ready to shower you with so much love .. I am just so soo happy for you 💃
outroText: Hope this made you smile — lots of love to the little one!
replayText: Watch it again, if it made your day ❤️
